title: [oc6] share api returns incorrect output when getting info on a share with subfiles=true
body:
**expected results**
all files within the folder are returned as shared

**actual results**
nothing other than status 100 is returned

**steps**
user a has folder (/f2), with files in it
user a shares the entire folder with user b

use the share api as follows to obtain information about the share:

where:

path = f2
subfiles = true

the output is as follows:
````
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<ocs>
 <meta>
  <status>ok</status>
  <statuscode>100</statuscode>
  <message/>
 </meta>
 <data/>
</ocs>
````


without using subfiles, or setting subfiles to false, the default, the output provides information about the folder share as expected:

````
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<ocs>
 <meta>
  <status>ok</status>
  <statuscode>100</statuscode>
  <message/>
 </meta>
 <data>
  <element>
   <id>5</id>
   <item_type>folder</item_type>
   <item_source>38</item_source>
   <parent/>
   <share_type>0</share_type>
   <share_with>ser72</share_with>
   <file_source>38</file_source>
   <path>/f2</path>
   <permissions>31</permissions>
   <stime>1386606363</stime>
   <expiration/>
   <token/>
   <storage>4</storage>
   <mail_send>0</mail_send>
   <share_with_displayname>ser72</share_with_displayname>
  </element>
 </data>
</ocs>
